text: THE MTV VMAs never shy from the outrageous and the glamorous and that ’ s just what pop ’ s finest brought tonight as they strutted in front of the cameras in LA. Singer Demi Lovato freed her nipples in a daring see - through lace top which she teamed with sequinned harem pants and black high heels. Rex Features 40 Demi Lovato freed the nipple as she arrived at the MTV VMAs Splash News 40 The singer smouldered for the cameras as she entered the ceremony Splash News 40 She teamed her see - through lace top with some sequined harem pants The singer, 25, smouldered into the camera lens and meant business with her smoky eye makeup, nude lips and cascading brunette locks
